<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 72</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All Pathfinder Society agents also have access to all assistive items from Morhen’s Mobility Apparel_

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These thick bull or ram horns fuse into the armrests of your legchair companion, giving it more aggressive options. Your animal companion can only invest this item if it is a [legchair](/AnimalCompanions.aspx?ID=30).
